name: This Farm Life
description:
Use W,A,S,D For Movement

Space to Buy Seeds

Space to Sell Crops 

K To Plant

L to Pick Crop

You are the manager of the farm your job is to buy seeds, plant crops, pick them before they die, and sell them.

Why are you the new manager, well the last one was fried for letting too many crops die before they could be sold?

If you Trash 3 things, you're fired as well.
So be careful.

Your score is number of items sold

Extra Points if you can sell to the customer that randomly shows up. but he will only buy 1 crop at a time.

You can only hold three items at a time. If you try to pick up an item when holding three it will be put in the trash.
